summary: Run an externally hosted UDF container
description:
Runs a compatible UDF container that is either externally hosted by a service provider or running on a local machine of the user. The UDF container must follow the [openEO UDF specification](https://open-eo.github.io/openeo-udf/).

The referenced UDF service can be executed in several processes such as ``aggregate_temporal()``, ``apply()``, ``apply_dimension()``, ``filter()`` and ``reduce()``. In this case an array is passed instead of a raster data cube. The user must ensure that the data is properly passed as an array so that the UDF can make sense of it.

data.description: The data to be passed to the UDF as array or raster data cube.

schema.title: Single Value
schema.description: A single value of any data type.

url.description: URL to a remote UDF service.

context.description: Additional data such as configuration options that should be passed to the UDF.

returns.description: The data processed by the UDF service. Returns a raster data cube if a raster data cube was passed for `data`. If an array was passed for `data`, the returned value is defined by the context and is exactly what the UDF returned.
